403: Not just any janitorial service can take on medical office cleaning jobs. Unlike janitorial cleaning for other kinds of offices and buildings, healthcare facility cleaning and medical office cleaning require specialized training and equipment in order to be done right.
404: Hygenic Solutions meets or exceeds medical office cleaning standards set by OSHA, CDC, and AORN. Medical offices contain illness-causing germs that can spread through a medical office for days. A janitorial service that provides a hygienic focused approach can assist in reducing the spread of infectious disease and illness causing germs.
405: The Hygic-Clean system, offered by Hygenic Solutions, consists of specialized training, hospital grade disinfectants, state of the art equipment including micro-fiber technology; HEPA vacuums with four levels of filtration and a focus on touch surface disinfection.
406: Our experience includes servicing all types of medical offices. The medical office cleaning provided by Hygenic Solutions is superior and competitively priced. If you desire to receive a janitorial service built for the medical environment, we are your service provider of trust!
414: Hygenic Solutions understands that a major focus of your fitness center is hygiene and customer safety. You need a sanitization service provider that is also health focused and offers a more specialized approach to janitorial services.
415: Hygenic Solutions uses hospital-grade disinfectants to properly clean your fitness center. We also use color-coded microfiber towels to prevent cross-contamination when we clean. Our Health Focused Cleaning Program focuses on disinfecting high-touch surfaces, which are the key pathway for the spread of germs in your facility. This is often overlooked by other gym and fitness center janitorial services
416: A clean and healthy facility can differentiate your fitness center and assist you in maintaining happy and healthy gym members.
450: We offer green seal products for our school cleaning programs and always use our Hygic-Clean system for bathrooms and kitchens leaving behind a sanitized environment where our kids can learn and play.
454: At Hygenic Solutions we believe that our students and school staff are the most important part when it comes to sanitizing a school. This is the reason we make every effort in providing a service above all others.
455: We also have available our dry vapor steaming for all hard surfaces that will preserve the life of furniture thus saving schools thousand of dollars.
456: Hygenic Solutions will teach schools about prevention, utilizing green cleaning products and procedures, and working to spread the responsibility around.
474: With proven floor sanitization methods and procedures you will enjoy clean and sanitized flooring that will leave your customers feeling great about your facility. Let us be the team to make those floors shine all over again!
504: Hygenic Solutions understands that your industrial facility needs to have clean floors; restrooms and the common areas must look nice to create a positive and safe environment.
505: Hygenic Solutions feels it’s also important to provide a health focused cleaning program to help reduce illness-causing germs that can decrease productivity. All industrial cleaning services offered by Hygenic Solutions are fully OSHA compliant.
506: Our industrial cleaning teams help facilities stay compliant with SDS regulations, chemical-handling standards, exposure control plans, and other regulatory restrictions. Give us a call for a new clean experience!
